trans-unit.source: Stores attachments to be sent as part of an email message.
trans-unit.target: 存储要作为电子邮件的一部分发送的附件。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentCollection> class are returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.AlternateViews%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Attachments%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
Use the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.AlternateViews%2A> property to specify copies of an email message in different formats.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.AlternateViews%2A>属性不同的格式指定电子邮件的副本。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use email readers that cannot display HTML content.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您在 HTML 中发送一条消息，你可能还想在某些收件人使用电子邮件的无法显示 HTML 内容的读取器的情况下提供的纯文本版本。

trans-unit.source: Use the collection returned by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Attachments%2A> property to add an attachment, such as a file or the contents of a <xref:System.IO.Stream> to this <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage>.
trans-unit.target: 使用返回的集合<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Attachments%2A>属性来添加附件，如文件或的内容<xref:System.IO.Stream>至此<xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create and send an email message with an attachment.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和发送带有附件的电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentCollection" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailMessage.Dispose%2A> method.
You do not have to call it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 无需在你的应用程序中调用它。
